text: Odacchi!! I have a question. Who has a longer head, Fukurokuju or Vice Admiral Strawberry?
I can't get any sleep at night until I learn the answer.
I think you can tell by comparing them. The answer is Strawberry. They say his head grows with every sadness he's experienced.
You've been drawing personifications of swords lately, but I'd like to see a human version of Luffy's straw hat now! Thanks for obliging!
Ahh, that's a new wrinkle. But as you know, I'm very good at capturing their spirit. Look, this one even has the scars left by Buggy!
Go ahead and fight, I won't fall off.
Oda Sensei!! My question is, why is the Kozuki Clan despised in modern Wano? I would have thought that Shinobu cleared his reputation with the public...

Everyone who believes in and follows the Kozuki Clan was purged by Orochi and Kaido. They brainwashed the next generation of children such that everyone in the capital follows Orochi. Basically, it comes down to pressure and brainwashing. These are big things that cause problems in the real world, even today. Scary!
